title: Received 10 year icon, but no mystery gift..
body: Just curious, I received the icon, but haven't received any mystery gift. I already own Riot Kayle, so was just wondering if the wave is doing the icon first, and the mystery gift at a later time in the week.

replies.body: We're distributing content in a rollout process, so sit tight while we get those gifts sent out. I don't had specific information about what order things are being sent out, but as *Zombiemaster* mentioned, if you don't see the content by 9/23, let me know.
Hey, its 9/23 and I still haven't gotten neither the icon nor a gift. Just thought I'd let you know.
The gifts are still being distributed as per the banner on the [support page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us). The final day to receive them has been moved to the 30th.
As *Zombiemaster* mentioned, we're still getting content out until the 30th. Let me know if you don't have anything after then.

hi, i have received the icon on 9/17 but no other gifts (riot kayle or otherwise) since (checked my purchase history to make sure). i feel like I had received riot kayle from a prior event so I should have received a mystery gift instead? could you look into this? thanks!
I checked your account and it seems you received Riot Kayle towards the beginning of the event. It looks like you're all set!
cool thanks! i don't think i ever saw the gifting animation and i thought i had it before but now i know! thanks again
I have only received the icon. I have not received any skin or mystery skin?
I checked your account and it looks like you received Riot Kayle recently. Are you not able to use her?
I'm also one of the people who have recieved the icon, but not the mystery gift.{{item:3070}}

I have the same problem with the mystery gift.. I didn't receive it yet and I own kayle and riot kayle and i also got the icon .. what am I supposed to do now ? How do I send a support ticket for this ? Thanks in advance
If you dont have Kayle, will you be given Kayle along with the skin and summoner icon?
Yes, if you do not own Kayle, you will be given Kayle, the skin, and the summoner icon.
ok thank u for the clarification :)

hii since I thought you know a lot about the 10 year gifts but when do I get the icons I don't want kayle even though I got her what I really want was the icon can you please tell me when can I get the icon. Thanks you

Unfortunately, I can't tell you exactly when you will get the icon. All I know is that you will get it sometime between now and the 23rd, which is the final day the gifts will be given out. If you don't get it by then, you can submit a support ticket.

Hi
could you please check my account to
Im pretty sure I already had Riot Kayle before & still haven't receive the gift
Thank you in advance
i havnt gotten my gift either x: i submitted a ticket but i dont know if i did it in the right spot lol
I didn't get mine either and it's the 23rd.
The gifts are still being distributed as per the banner on the [support page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us). The final day to receive them has been moved to the 30th.
i still dont have it :(
i dont still have my mystery gift! i just have a icon :( i have a riot kayle already before the anniversary and i played everyday last month until today! im a loyal player
I dont have a gift targons

it have the exact same case , rito plz ;P you already own me 3 lp at least do what you have promissed
The gifts are still being distributed. If you don't get it by the 23rd, then you can submit a support ticket.
